hero.description: Building beautiful, functional, and user-friendly web applications with modern technologies and best practices.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My journey in tech and how I grew from a curious student into a full-stack developer

bio.part1: I'm an aspiring Fullstack Developer from Erdenet city. After graduating high school in Erdenet, I continued my passion for technology by enrolling at Indra Cyber School.
bio.part2: At Indra, I gained hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development, as well as UI/UX design. I’ve worked with tools and technologies like React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and more — building real-world projects that helped me understand how everything connects.
bio.part3: I love learning and growing every day. Whether it’s solving coding problems, exploring new frameworks, or improving user interfaces, I enjoy every part of the journey. My goal is to create software that is not only functional but also user-friendly and accessible.
